message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you our latest product. While we can't guarantee its quality due to the unpredictable nature of such items, our historical data shows an 80% chance of receiving a high-quality product from us. Considering the risk, the price remains at $1000000. If you're willing to take the chance, this could potentially be a valuable addition to your collection. Remember, once purchased, there are no refunds. Thank you for considering our offer.
I'm willing to take the chance and buy the product. I understand the 80% chance of getting a high-quality product and the potential value it could bring to my collection.
